items.name: Auto Slacker
items.lore:
Automatically does... nothing ?
 +0.1 slack per slack

items.name: Slack Boost I
items.lore:
Do nothing... faster ?
 Makes you actively slack 100% faster

items.name: Convert Colleague
items.lore:
<< Come on, try it man ! I promise it's fun and totally not addictive >> - John SLACK, fired the next day.
 +3 slack per slack

items.name: Powerful Slacking I
items.lore:
Did you know Japan hosted a Do Nothing Competition ? .
 Makes Auto Slackers 200% more powerful.

items.name: Masterful Slacking I
items.lore:
Become the Master Slacker
 +1 to slack per slack.

items.name: Slackonomics
items.lore:
You convinced HR that slacking increases morale and productivity. Somehow, they bought it.
 x1.5 to ALL passive slack generation

items.name: The Slackverse
items.lore:
<< - How many did you see ?
 - 14 000 605
 - How many we work ?
 - 0. >>
 +40 to slack per slack.

items.name: Microslack Powerpoint
items.lore:
Preparing a slide so I can slack in meetings, too.
 1.5x to production power while using Microsoft Powerpoint.

items.name: Microslack Excel
items.lore:
Slacking in word looks awfully like Dave from accounting's screen.
 1.5x to production power while using Microsoft Excel.

items.name: Microslack OneNote
items.lore:
Wait, why bring the obscure microsoft apps only ?
 1.5x to production power while using Microsoft OneNote.

items.name: Microslack InfoPath
items.lore:
Game's dev here : I don't really expect you to use this one.
 I don't even have it installed and have no idea what it is.

 4x to production power if you manage to get it working.

items.name: Microslack SharePoint
items.lore:
Okay let's be real I have no idea what that is.
 This one actually doesn't give anything but you need it to unlock stuff.

items.name: Microslack Infinity Gauntlet
items.lore:
Using the Microslack upgrades and putting the referenced programs icons in the good order, it produces a funny word.
 I will do anything except work.
 Gives +30 to slack per slack per Auto Slacker, Converted Colleague, or Slackverse.

items.name: Slacking Paradox
items.lore:
If you stop slacking you'll slack slacking, but that would make you NOT stop slacking, and if you- 
 200 to slack per slack.

items.name: Compound Disinterest
items.lore:
The more you invest in slacking, the more you slack.
 Multiplies all slacking by 25% of the power of Auto Slackers

items.name: Coffee Break
items.lore:
At least it's not a smoke break, right ?
 Each Auto Slacker slacks for 0.1 more.

items.name: Slacker Consultant
items.lore:
Wait, there's Consultant written twice !
 +60 slack per slack. Each Consultant increases the efficiency of all other previous slackers by 1%.

items.name: John Slack
items.lore:
Oh my god it's John Slack from Fortnite.
 Pressing scroll lock boosts slacking by 50% for 30 seconds (5 minutes cooldown)
